Package com.github.m5rian.jdaCommandHandler

Annotation Type CommandEvent

@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(METHOD)
public @interface CommandEvent
This annotation marks a command as usable. It contains all important information to execute the command.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type Required Element Description
    java.lang.String name
    Retrieves the main executor of the command

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    java.lang.String[] aliases
    Retrieves all aliases of the command.
    Channel channel
    Retrieves the required channel type for the command to run.
    java.lang.Class<? extends Permission>[] requires
    Retrieves the required permissions for this command.

  • Element Details

    • name

      java.lang.String name
      Retrieves the main executor of the command
      Returns:
      The command executor.

    • aliases

      java.lang.String[] aliases
      Retrieves all aliases of the command.
      Returns:
      The command aliases.
      Default:
      {}

    • requires

      java.lang.Class<? extends Permission>[] requires
      Retrieves the required permissions for this command.
      Returns:
      The required permissions.
      Default:
      {com.github.m5rian.jdaCommandHandler.Everyone.class}

    • channel

      Channel channel
      Retrieves the required channel type for the command to run. If Channel.DEFAULT the command will react on guild and direct messages.
      Returns:
      The channel type of the command.
      Default:
      DEFAULT
